item.title: A New ‘Mystery Skin’ is Coming to Marvel Rivals to Celebrate Captain America: Brave New World Release
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/marvel-rivals-red-hulk-mystery-skin/

A new mystery skin is going to be coming to Marvel Rivals for those who purchase tickets to watch Captain America: Brave New World.

The announcement was made by the Regal Crown Club, which said that those who purchase theatre tickets to watch Captain America: Brave New World will receive three exclusive items for Marvel Rivals.

The three items will be a spray, nameplate, and mystery costume.

What is the Mystery Costume in Marvel Rivals

It’s currently unclear what the mystery costume will be to celebrate Captain America: Brave New World in Marvel Rivals, but the spray and nameplate will be Captain America-related.

However, given that Captain America: Brave New World will feature the Red Hulk for the first time ever (played by Harrison Ford), it will almost certainly be a skin for the Hulk. While it’s not yet confirmed, a Red Hulk skin in Marvel Rivals would be easy to implement without profound changes to the existing default Hulk skin (just a change of skin color, face, and probably shorts).

If the skin isn’t Red Hulk, Captain America is the likely next option.

Luckily though, speculation of what the skin will be won’t have to last long, as Captain America: Brave New World hits theatre on on February 14.

How to Get the Mystery Skin

For those wanting to get the mystery skin, Regal Crown Club says that theatergoers must purchase their tickets by February 17 to collect the skin.

Presumably, ticket purchases will then receive a redemption code in their emails after purchasing the ticket.

Marvel Rivals currently has a total of 37 playable heroes in the game, with developer NetEase Games confirming that the game will receive two new heroes a season moving forward. The Thing and the Human Torch are the next heroes to be released, and you can find out when here.

What do you think the mystery skin will be in Marvel Rivals? Let us know on the Insider Gaming forum.
